sections.heading: Overview
content:
Richard Brown, MD, associate professor of clinical psychiatry at Columbia
University and a practicing psychopharmacologist, is the country's leading
clinical expert on SAM-e. He has been using SAM-e to treat his patients--some
resistant to other antidepressants--with great success for over five years. An
aggressive advocate for depressed patients, Dr. Brown is winning acceptance
among the psychiatric community for this new therapy.
